name: fend-mobile-portfolio
description: this is the project for frontend nanodegree[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[D[Csecond [2~project [2~for frontend nanodegree to practice how to optimize the speed of a page.
author: Yuguo LI

scripts.mktopfolder: mkdirp dist -p && mkdirp dist/css -p && mkdirp dist/js -p && mkdirp dist/img -p
scripts.optimizecss:top: cleancss -O1 specialComments:off src/css/print.css -o dist/css/print.css && cleancss -O1 specialComments:off src/css/style.css -o dist/css/style.css
scripts.mkpizzafolder: mkdirp dist/views/js -p && mkdirp dist/views/css -p && mkdirp dist/views/images -p
scripts.optimizecss:pizza: cleancss -O1 specialComments:off src/views/css/bootstrap-grid.css -o dist/views/css/bootstrap-grid.css && cleancss -O1 specialComments:off src/views/css/style.css -o dist/views/css/style.css
scripts.autoprefixer: postcss -u autoprefixer -r dist/css/* && postcss -u autoprefixer -r dist/views/css/*
scripts.imagemin: imagemin src/img/* -o dist/img && imagemin src/views/images/* -o dist/views/images
scripts.copyhtml: cp src/*.html dist/ && cp src/views/*.html dist/views/
